name: avr-asm-navigator
description: Hover, definition, completion, and symbol lookup helpers for AVR® assembly projects.

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release:check: npm run check && npm run package:vsix

avrAsmNavigator.dfpPath.description: Path to a DFP root folder. If empty, it is auto-detected from .vscode/*.mplab.json packs, then resolved from installed Microchip® *_DFP packs.

avrAsmNavigator.device.description: AVR® device name override (examples: AVR128DA32, ATmega4809). If empty, it is auto-detected from .vscode/*.mplab.json, then inferred from workspace source hints, then inferred from the active DFP.

avrAsmNavigator.autoDetectMplabProject.description: Auto-detect device and DFP pack from .vscode/*.mplab.json files.

avrAsmNavigator.maxHoverResults.description: Maximum pack symbol matches shown in hover.

avrAsmNavigator.maxCompletionItems.description: Maximum completion items returned for local symbols, AVR instructions, and active-target pack symbols.

avrAsmNavigator.enableCompletion.description: Enable completion items from local labels, AVR instructions, and active-target pack symbols.

avrAsmNavigator.enableInstructionComplet.description: Enable built-in AVR instruction mnemonic completion items.

avrAsmNavigator.enableReferences.description: Enable Find References provider for AVR® assembly symbols.

avrAsmNavigator.includeDfpInWorkspaceSym.description: Include DFP symbols in workspace symbol search results.

avrAsmNavigator.maxWorkspaceScanFiles.description: Maximum workspace assembly files scanned for references/workspace symbols.

avrAsmNavigator.maxWorkspaceSymbols.description: Maximum symbols returned from workspace symbol search.

avrAsmNavigator.maxReferenceResults.description: Maximum locations returned by Find References.
